>
[Disintegration Bolt](/Equipment.aspx?ID=161)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 559 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,300 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** [bolt](/Weapons.aspx?ID=81)

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The shaft of this bolt is scorched and blackened, and handling it coats your fingers with a fine black powder. When an activated _disintegration bolt_ hits a target, it is subject to a [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=76) spell requiring a DC 34 Fortitude save. As with the spell, a critical hit on the attack roll causes the target’s saving throw outcome to be one degree worse.

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of _disintegrate_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Disintegration Bolt
